characters.name: Yoshi

characters.name: Benkei

character_development: First encounter with Yoshi at the bridge

relationships_affected.description: First meeting with Yoshi that led to their partnership

relationships.dynamic: Loyal companion and foil to Yoshi's more precise fighting style
